description: They start moving forward… But then they notice, how are they doing it? They don’t feel the ground below their… Feet? Looking down confusion strikes; they don’t have feet! Hell, they don’t even have legs! But when they are going to start panicking memories come back to them.
Yes, this is totally normal, nameHere are a wisp after all. Now that they have a sense of self things start making a little more sense, though they still don’t remember much.
Assuming that the forest may hold answers and even their memories nameHere continues moving forward until space starts to contort and change and another wisp appears just in front of them.
Fear? nameHere should be feeling it, by any metric this is scary but… They can’t shake the feeling that they know them, even if they don’t remember.
Before nameHere can even try and say anything they just ask them a question, giving even options to answer it.
Yuzz

question.text: When was Meiya's first ever karaoke stream?

description: No... It wasn't like that... They remember now, yes, that actually happened on December 25th 2022, they have seen it happen, actually. How could nameHere have forgotten? They remember now, this Meiya was an important figure for them, someone that they looked up to for several reasons..

nameHere answered using their instinct but they remember now… Yes, that happened, they have seen it happen, actually. How could nameHere have forgotten? They remember now, this Meiya was an important figure for them, someone that they looked up to for several reasons.
And they now recognize the other wisp, who just points towards certain direction, nameHere understands, their journey must continue if they want to recover their memories.

Not much time passes before the situation repeats itself. Space contorts and changes and another wisp appears in front of nameHere… Already expecting this it doesn’t suppose too much of a surprise anymore.
Meyvol

question.text: What game has Meiya told on stream that started chats whole funny copypasta shenanigans?

description: Pikachu90021 (George)

question.text: Way back then chat fought with Meiya to add this emote on stream to the point of people making PowerPoints as to why we need it, what emote was this?

description: Neji

question.text: What creature is Meiya known for killing (In game)?

description: MetalOverlordX

question.text: What does Meiya like in her pizza?

description: Fayris

question.text: Which game did Meiya first ever sang/made up the Debt Song?

description: Star

question.text: Which game was Meiya playing when she got approved as a partner?

description: Digi

question.text: Excluding Strangers of Paradise, which main line Final Fantasy game did Meiya stream first?

description: Onyx

Oh, nameHere answered wrong? Well, that's too bad, isn't it? It would be too bad if they were to have to try again, wouldn't it? Well, that's exactly whats going to happen, but they should hurry! There isn't much time left.

Each question and answer brought one piece of the puzzle, all those marvellous memories and people. nameHere was so happy there, but why? Why would they leave? Why did they forget about it all? nameHere knows that they would never want to leave and even now they don’t want anything else than just going back to them, going back to where they belong.

Impatience fills them and nameHere can’t help but notice a package that they have been carrying since they woke up. Is this related to the reason as for why they left? It must be… nameHere knows it’s important and that they must have it with them.

Before nameHere can finish organizing their thoughts they notice that are some wooden doors close by and no space distortion this time… And as nameHere gets closer they can recognize two wisps that they saw before, Fayris and Yuzz, who guided they gently at the start of their journey.

Both of them start speaking at the same time, asking how their journey there was, if nameHere had a good time. At first the conversation seems like idle chatter but as it goes on the last piece of the puzzle falls in place…

nameHere finally remembers! Meiya’s birthday! they went to get a present for her but strayed too far from the shrine which is the place that maintains their form, the other two explain as the doors start to open.
They tease they and usher them to hurry, if nameHere doesn't want to be late. Late? Is it today!? nameHere frantically goes inside, going back home.
